content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron-plate.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) used for smelting copper ore into copper-plate.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 10}, status NO_POWER, research topic automation, and electrical_id 26180.
- ElectricityGroup (id 26180) connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (9.5, 6.5), and (10.5, 7.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(-10.5, 18.5) producing electricity; warnings include “not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, and “no fluid present in connections”; connection points at (-10.5, 16.0) and (-10.5, 21.0); status NOT_CONNECTED.
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for heating water; warning “out of fuel” applies; contains a fluid box with water (amount ≈190.35, temperature 15) and fluid_system [133011]; connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); steam output at (-7.5, 24.5); status NO_FUEL.
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water intake; status WORKING; connection point at (-9.5, 23.5); contains a fluid box with water (amount ≈99.24, temperature 15) using fluid_system [133011].
- Wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5) serving as the manual fuel feeding system.
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
   - PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 133011, status WORKING.
   - PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 133010, status EMPTY.
   - PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) with fluid_system 133023, status EMPTY.
   - PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) with fluid_system 133022, status EMPTY.
   - PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 133018, status EMPTY.
   - PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) with fluid_system 133027, status EMPTY.
   - PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 133026, status EMPTY.
   - PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 133029, status EMPTY.
   - PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 133030, status EMPTY.
   - PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system 133031, status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Multiple connection attempts using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system IDs [128363, 128447, 128529, 128613, 128695, 128779, 128861, 128945] failed.
  – Tip: Use the active fluid_system identifiers present in the established pipeline network when attempting connections.

• Multiple connection attempts using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system IDs [129027, 129111, 129193, 129277, 129359, 129443, 129525, 129609, 129691, 129775, 129857, 129941, 130023, 130107, 130189, 130273] within a 15‐tile radius near position(-5.5, 19.5) failed.
  – Tip: Validate that candidate pipe groups lie within the effective search radius and use the active fluid_system identifier.

• Connection attempts in steps 2568–2575 using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system IDs [130355, 130439, 130521, 130605, 130687, 130771, 130853, 130937] failed to locate a candidate group near position(-5.5, 19.5).
  – Tip: Ensure the fluid_system identifiers in connection attempts reflect the current pipeline configuration.

• Multiple connection attempts using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system IDs [131019, 131103, 131185, 131269, 131351, 131435, 131517, 131601] failed to locate candidate groups within a 15‐tile search radius near position(-5.5, 19.5).
  – Tip: Confirm that pipe group fluid_system identifiers are updated and correctly positioned within the designated search radius.

• Multiple connection attempts using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system IDs [131683, 131767, 131849, 131933, 132015, 132099, 132181, 132265] failed to locate any candidate pipe group within a 15‐tile search radius near position(-5.5, 19.5).
  – Tip: Ensure connection attempts use updated active fluid_system identifiers that match the current pipeline network configuration.

• Inconsistencies in fluid_system references among the boiler, offshore pump, and associated pipe groups resulted in connection failures.
  – Tip: Synchronize fluid_system assignments across all pipeline components to maintain uniformity.

• Repeated connection attempts using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system IDs [132347, 132431, 132513, 132597, 132679, 132763, 132845, 132929] failed to find any candidate within the effective 15‐tile radius near position(-5.5, 19.5).
  – Tip: Verify that candidate pipe groups are present and correctly assigned with active fluid_system identifiers corresponding to the updated pipeline network configuration.
